predicate.note: Frames file for 'rekindle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4.

example.name: rarely a literal fire
example.text: Last week, a mediator failed [*-2] to rekindle talks between the company and the strikers, who have rejected a pay raise offer of 10% over three years.
example.arg: talks between the company and the strikers, who have rejected a pay raise offer of 10% over three years
